apiDocPrefix.message: admin.apiDocPrefix has been deprecated, use apidoc.prefix instead

disableAPIDoc.message: admin.disableAPIDoc has been deprecated, use apidoc.disabled instead

perURLAuthentication.message: Config settings related to authentication have been deprecated (APIKeyAuthType, and APIKeyAuthPlugin), use accessControl for API security instead
